item.title: That first trip to the Opera
item.author: Obi Thompson Sargoni,
item.description: I was sitting restlessly, bored in the last lecture of the day when a friend turned round to ask me if I fancied going to see an opera that evening, Il Barbiere di Siviglia (or The Barber of Seville) at the Royal Opera House.
